rows.label: tlk45320151_03_msg0001
rows.name:
At this rate, the Superbia Divine Beast's
ether will soon be exhausted...

rows.label: tlk45320151_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Yet still His Majesty refuses to
take refuge in Gula.

rows.label: tlk45320151_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I appreciate why, of course. He cannot
bring himself to abandon his people,
and he trusts in all of you implicitly.

rows.label: tlk45320151_03_msg0004
rows.name: We feel the same way ourselves.
